lines.text: Write down the series of steps

secText:
Lesson:
1. Create a testable question and determine the equipment and technology needed when [OBJ:expsec_rm31:conducting an experiment].
2. Identify the [OBJ:expsec_rm33:variables in the lab], write a procedure, record data, and be mindful of accuracy and precision when conducting an experiment.
3. [OBJ:expsec_rm333451:Determine ways to recycle] when designing an experiment.
4. [OBJ:expsec_rm34:Determine ways to be safe] during an experiment.
5. Define [OBJ:expsec_a380:precision and accuracy].
6. Compare [OBJ:expsec_a381:precision versus accuracy].
7. Determine [OBJ:expsec_a382:methods to be more precise and accurate] in experiments. Determine if [OBJ:expsec_rm35:data gathered in an experiment is reasonable].
8. [OBJ:expsec_rm35:Analyze the data] collected in an experiment.
9. [OBJ:expsec_rm37:Present the findings] from an experiment.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_sci_lab_procedures:Lab Procedures], [OBJ:sum_precision_accuracy:Precision versus Accuracy], [OBJ:sum_lab_part_2:Lab Data and Presentation]
